featured.text: This was to ensure that no single and powerful noble family could seize the title and pass it to the next generation.
The reincarnated leaders were always “discovered” in the households of lowly families __(20)__ noble ones.

definition.zh_def: 高貴的，具有崇高品德或地位的。
definition.en_def: Having or showing fine personal qualities or high moral principles.
definition.example: She comes from a noble family known for its charitable work.
